attributes.action: review the judges decision in the frances inglis case to set her free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Frances Inglis's 22 year old son Tom, was left in a "vegetative state" after he fell off the back of an ambulance. He underwent several operations, however he was left in such a way that his mother felt we would have had no quality of life at all. She did the brave and courageous thing and ended her Son’s misery with a lethal dose of heroin. 
please please if there is any REAL justice then take note of the signatures on this petition and free this lady immediatly..a custodial sentence does not serve anyones best interest!

rejection.details: Individual sentences are a matter for the courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
